typeSystemDescription.name: OAQATypes
typeSystemDescription.description:
Type system descriptor for the OAQA data model.
Changes in 2.4: * Added super types from NEAL project: Concept and ConceptMention. * Added Entity type, inherited from Concept. * Added RelationMention, inherited from ConceptMention. * NamedEntity is now renamed to EntityMention, and inherited from ConceptMention. Moved ids field to Concept. * Triple type is generalized and renamed to Relation. Subject, object, and other fields are replaced with arguments field. * TripleStore search result is updated to RelationBaseSearchResult, which is now based on Relation instead of Triple. * PassageFromTriple is updated to PassageFromRelation. * Field namedEntities is removed from Parse type. * Added new container type Interpretation to integrate Concepts and ConceptMentions. * Predicate type now renamed to Token. - Zi Yang <ziy@cs.cmu.edu>
Changes in 0.2.3: * Added new type Parse to aggregate NLP annotations, e.g. predicates, named entities, semantic roles. - Zi Yang <ziy@cs.cmu.edu>
Changes in 0.2.2: * Merged annotation QuestionClass with Question, and rebased Question on GerpAnnotation instead of InputElement. - Zi Yang <ziy@cs.cmu.edu>
Changes in 0.2.1: * Brought AnswerList and Search back to type system from version 0.1. - Zi Yang <ziy@cs.cmu.edu>
Changes in 0.2: * Grouped types into packages: answer, retrieval, nlp, input, gerp, core * Added GERP related types: GerpMeta, GerpBase, GerpTop, GerpAnnotation, Evidence, Rank, PruningDecision * Removed probability and componentId from OAQATop and OAQAAnnotation. Components (can be multiple) that generate the FSs need to be specified in the generators field of GerpTop or GerpAnnotation, and the probability should be given in the associated evidences or ranks fields. * Simplified types, e.g. Answer, CandidateAnswerVariant, and SearchResult. Features can be represented by those in GerpTop/GerpAnnotation. For example, searchResultList or supportingEvidenceSearches can be represented in additionalEvidences field of Evidence, and features or featureVectors are naturally the combination of confidence in the Evidence, rankVector can be represented by Ranks. * Removed list types, e.g. AnswerList and Search. The common meta information will be stored in the GerpMeta. For example, featureLabels are stored in the evidencers field. * Removed feature types, e.g. CandidateAnswerFeature (formerly CaFeature). They are mostly Evidences. * Updated superclass of most types from OAQATop/OAQAAnnotation to GerpTop/GerpAnnotation, e.g. QuestionClass * Added an imported type system frameworkTypesDescriptor, and updated the supertype of Question to InputElement. - Zi Yang <ziy@cs.cmu.edu>

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.core.OAQATop
typeDescription.description: The base class for OAQA feature structures that are not Annotations.

featureDescription.name: implementingWrapper
featureDescription.description: The name of the Java wrapper class that enables more convenient methods for the original derived Java class.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.core.OAQAAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The Question Analysis supertype that defines the attributes common to all question analysis results.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.nlp.Token
typeDescription.description: Annotation on a token, which may have arguments if they are predicates; useful in transforming text into a "logical form", with affordances similar to the ones provided in Extended WordNet and the like. --- Source: Murdock

featureDescription.name: arguments
featureDescription.description: The arguments

featureDescription.name: argumentLabels
featureDescription.description: The slot labels for the arguments (e.g., subj, obj, objprep)

featureDescription.name: parse
featureDescription.description: A parse for which this token was a head (if any)

featureDescription.name: semanticType
featureDescription.description: A semantic type, typically the name of an Entity Annotation type

featureDescription.name: partOfSpeech
featureDescription.description: Coarse-grained part of speech --- Example: noun, verb, adj, cord

featureDescription.name: lemmaForm
featureDescription.description: A canonical/lemmatized form of the covered text

featureDescription.name: isMainReference
featureDescription.description: If true, then this is the main reference to the first argument. Modifiers and anaphoric references do not have isMainReference set. --- Example: "A dark blue [hat]"

featureDescription.name: isVariable
featureDescription.description: True iff the token expresses some unknown entity, typically the focus of a question: --- Example: "[Who] shot JR?", "What [city] was JR born in?"

featureDescription.name: determiner
featureDescription.description: The determiner attached to the node, if any --- Example: [the] book

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.nlp.Focus
typeDescription.description: The phrase in the question that indicates the answer variable.

featureDescription.name: token
featureDescription.description: The corresponding token for the focus.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: String representation of the Question Focus.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.nlp.LexicalAnswerType
typeDescription.description: The lexical answer type found in the question.

featureDescription.name: token
featureDescription.description: The corresponding token for the LAT.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The normalized LAT string.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.nlp.AnswerType
typeDescription.description: A Named Entity type that represents the type of the answer being sought.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: An answer type identified for the question.

featureDescription.name: targetType
featureDescription.description: The actual target type annotation.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.nlp.SemanticRole
typeDescription.description: A semantic role label.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The semantic role label.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.input.Question
typeDescription.description: The Question and any associated meta-data.

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: A unique id for the question.

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The source of the question, e.g., TREC11, Jeopardy, etc.

featureDescription.name: questionType
featureDescription.description: The class of the question, determined by either an automatic question classification process or human judgment.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: The question content.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.SearchResult
typeDescription.description: A search result.

featureDescription.name: uri
featureDescription.description: An identifier for the source of this search result, e.g., the name of the file that this result is drawn from, which, when combined with offset and length, uniquely identifies the span of text for this result.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: Relevance score associated with the search result.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: The text associated with the hit.

featureDescription.name: rank
featureDescription.description: Rank of this result in the original hit-list.

featureDescription.name: queryString
featureDescription.description: The query string associated with the hit.

featureDescription.name: searchId
featureDescription.description: ID of the search object to which this search result belongs (matches the searchId field in the Search object).

featureDescription.name: candidateAnswers
featureDescription.description: CandidateAnswerVariants generated from this SearchResult.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.answer.Answer
typeDescription.description: An answer generated by the QA system.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: The actual answer string.

featureDescription.name: variants
featureDescription.description: Array of candidate answer variant ids that were merged into this final answer.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.Passage
typeDescription.description: A passage search result.

featureDescription.name: title
featureDescription.description: The title of the document that contains this passage.

featureDescription.name: docId
featureDescription.description: A unique identifier for the document that conatins this passage.

featureDescription.name: begin
featureDescription.description: Character offset of the start of this passage within the document that contains this passage.

featureDescription.name: end
featureDescription.description: Character offset of the end of this passage within the document that contains this passage.

featureDescription.name: aspects
featureDescription.description: Aspects of the gold standard passage.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.nlp.CandidateAnswerOccurrence
typeDescription.description: Annotates a span of text identified as a candidate answer.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: The candidate answer string.

featureDescription.name: mentionType
featureDescription.description: The manner in which covered text refers to some entity, e.g. NAME, NOMINAL, PRONOUN

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.answer.CandidateAnswerVariant
typeDescription.description: A variant of a candidate answer. A variant may have multiple occurrences, all of which are collected in a variant object.

featureDescription.name: occurrences
featureDescription.description: The occurrences of this variant.

featureDescription.name: candidateId
featureDescription.description: Unique id of this candidate answer variant.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: The candidate answer string.

featureDescription.name: alternativeNames
featureDescription.description: alternative names for a given candidate answer variant, e.g. Tandy, Tandy Inc. for candidate answer Variant Tandy Incorporated

featureDescription.name: uri
featureDescription.description: A unique identifier for this candidate. All candidate answers in the same candidate answer group will have the same uri. A candidate answer group is formed at candidate generation time when additional derived candidate answers are created from the root candidate answer.

featureDescription.name: docId
featureDescription.description: The unique id of the document (if any) from which this candidate answer was generated.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.input.QuestionType
typeDescription.description: Enumeration of the possible values for the question class.

value.description: A question about a fact that can be "looked up".
A question that contains a definition of the answer or is asking for a definition.
There are two or more sentences in the question, separated by a period or a semicolon.
There are two or more distinct definitions of the same answer term.
The answer is either an abbreviation or an abbreviation expansion from the question.
No class was assigned to this question.
The answer to the question is a list of things.
The question is asking for an opinion.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.QueryConcept
typeDescription.description: A query concept in the abstract search query model.

featureDescription.name: namedEntityTypes
featureDescription.description: List of Named Entity types associated with this concept.

featureDescription.name: conceptType
featureDescription.description: The type of this concept.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: The keyword text.

featureDescription.name: originalText
featureDescription.description: The lexical string in the question.

featureDescription.name: operator
featureDescription.description: The operator associated with this concept. This must be a complex concept.

featureDescription.name: operatorArgs
featureDescription.description: The operator arguments in a complex query concept.

featureDescription.name: partOfSpeech
featureDescription.description: The part of speech of the concept.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.QueryOperator
typeDescription.description: A query operator in the abstract search query model.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name (kind) of the operator.

featureDescription.name: args
featureDescription.description: The arguments for the operator.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.AbstractQuery
typeDescription.description: An abstract search query for the question that represents query concepts and query operators over those concepts.

featureDescription.name: concepts
featureDescription.description: The list of query concepts that make up this abstract query. The list is ordered.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.nlp.ConceptType
typeDescription.description: An enumeration of the allowed abstract query concept types.

value.description: Answer candidate suggestion, used mostly in Virtual Annotation.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.QueryOperatorName
typeDescription.description: An enumeration of the allowed query operator names.

value.description: all query concepts underneath are synonyms of each other
all query concepts in order are a phrase
An "or", i.e., a disjunction of the argument nodes.
the concepts underneath are weighted per the float stored in the operator
the concepts underneath are all required, if possible
the concepts underneath are below a relation, which is stored within the operator

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.Document
typeDescription.description: A document search result.

featureDescription.name: title
featureDescription.description: The title of the document.

featureDescription.name: docId
featureDescription.description: A unique identifier for this document.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.AnswerSearchResult
typeDescription.description: A search result where the candidate answer is obtained as part of the search process and saved in the text field of the search result.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.RelationSearchResult
typeDescription.description: A search result from a triple store, e.g., an RDF store.

featureDescription.name: context
featureDescription.description: The context of the triple store search result, i.e., triples identifying all neighboring nodes in the store.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.kb.Relation
typeDescription.description: A relation concept. It represents the relationship between entities. which is generalized from a triple, e.g., and RDF triple.

featureDescription.name: arguments
featureDescription.description: Arguments of type Entity of the relation.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.kb.EntityMention
typeDescription.description: A named entity mention that identify or define the named entity concept.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.PassageFromRelation
typeDescription.description: A passage search result that was the result of a search from the subject and object of a triple

featureDescription.name: sourceRelation
featureDescription.description: The triple from which the search result was generated

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.gerp.GerpTop
typeDescription.description: The base class for Gerp feature structures that are not Annotations, with G/E/E/P features defined.

featureDescription.name: generators
featureDescription.description: An array of genenator names that nominee this feature structure to be the candidate of a certain targeted entity.

featureDescription.name: evidences
featureDescription.description: An array of evidences generated by evidencers for a particular GERP feature structure. Each element corresponds to the evidence from an evidencer.

featureDescription.name: ranks
featureDescription.description: An array of ranks generated by rankers for a particular GERP feature structure. Each element corresponds to the rank from a ranker.

featureDescription.name: pruningDecisions
featureDescription.description: An array of purning decisions generated by pruners for a particular GERP feature structure. Each element corresponds to the pruning decision from a pruner. The final decision will be made by a multiplexer (or phrase driver).

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.gerp.GerpAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A higher level supertype for all GERPified annotations that defines the common attributes (G/E/R/P).

featureDescription.name: generators
featureDescription.description: An array of genenator names that nominee this feature structure to be the candidate of a certain targeted entity.

featureDescription.name: evidences
featureDescription.description: An array of evidences generated by evidencers for a particular GERP feature structure. Each element corresponds to the evidence from an evidencer.

featureDescription.name: ranks
featureDescription.description: An array of ranks generated by rankers for a particular GERP feature structure. Each element corresponds to the rank from a ranker.

featureDescription.name: pruningDecisions
featureDescription.description: An array of purning decisions generated by pruners for a particular GERP feature structure. Each element corresponds to the pruning decision from a pruner. The final decision will be made by a multiplexer (or phrase driver).

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.gerp.Evidence
typeDescription.description: A type represents the evidence for the candidate entities, which is provided by an evidencer.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: A score that indicates how likely the evidencer estimates the entity is qualified for the task.

featureDescription.name: additionalEvidences
featureDescription.description: Detailed evidences provided by the evidencer in addition to the confidence score, e.g. related document URIs where a text similarity based evidence is calculated.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.gerp.Rank
typeDescription.description: A type represents the rank for the candidate entities, which is normally done by a ranker's synthesized analysis of collected evidences.

featureDescription.name: rank
featureDescription.description: A non-negative integer represents the rank of candidate.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: A float value represents how likely the candidate is relevant. The value is not required to have a probabilistic interpretation, instead any similarity, distance, etc. can be used.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.gerp.PruningDecision
typeDescription.description: A type represents the pruning decision for the candidate entities, which is provided by a pruner.

featureDescription.name: decision
featureDescription.description: A binary pruning decision made by a pruner.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.gerp.GerpMeta
typeDescription.description: A GERP-style component type, which contains some generators, evidencers, rankers and pruners, that capture the common metadata shared across the feature structures (GerpTops and GerpAnnotations) to be generated in the component, e.g. the name of all generators, evidencers, rankers and pruners.

featureDescription.name: generators
featureDescription.description: An array of generator names.

featureDescription.name: evidencers
featureDescription.description: An array of evidencer names.

featureDescription.name: rankers
featureDescription.description: An array of ranker names.

featureDescription.name: pruners
featureDescription.description: An array of pruner names.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.gerp.GerpBase
typeDescription.description: A base class for GERP intermediate data: Evidence, Rank, PruningDecision.

featureDescription.name: comments
featureDescription.description: A placeholder for any additional comments that evidencers, rankers or pruners may provide.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.retrieval.Search
typeDescription.description: An object that holds a query and results for a search (text search, fact search, KB search, etc.)

featureDescription.name: query
featureDescription.description: The query in the native syntax of the corresponding search engine.

featureDescription.name: hitList
featureDescription.description: Hit list of search results, sorted in descreasing order of relevance score.

featureDescription.name: abstractQuery
featureDescription.description: The abstract query from which this actual query was generated.

featureDescription.name: searchId
featureDescription.description: An identifier for this search result. Used to collect hit-list objects that belong to this search result after they've been split out for parallel processing then gathered up again.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.answer.AnswerList
typeDescription.description: A ranked list of candidate answers.

featureDescription.name: answerList
featureDescription.description: Hit list of candidate answers, rank ordered, with highest scoring answer first.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.nlp.Parse
typeDescription.description: A data structure that represents various NLP annotations from a parser, e.g. lists of tokens, semantic roles, etc.

featureDescription.name: tokens
featureDescription.description: A list of tokens.

featureDescription.name: semanticRoles
featureDescription.description: A list of semantic roles.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.kb.Concept
typeDescription.description: A superclass for EntityConcept and RelationConcept.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the concept.

featureDescription.name: ids
featureDescription.description: Array of ids that identify this named entity. There may be more than one id if this named entity is ambiguous. The ids are typically URIs.

featureDescription.name: mentions
featureDescription.description: A list of ConceptMentions (text spans) that might be surface forms to this concept.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.kb.ConceptMention
typeDescription.description: A superclass for EntityMention and RelationMention.

featureDescription.name: concept
featureDescription.description: The abstract concept that the text span conveys.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.kb.RelationMention
typeDescription.description: A named relation mention that identify or define the named relation concept.

featureDescription.name: argumentMentions
featureDescription.description: A list of entity mentions being the arguments (e.g. sub, obj, etc.) of the relation mention.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.kb.Entity
typeDescription.description: An abstract normalized entity, which may have various surface forms (alternative representations).

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.kb.Interpretation
typeDescription.description: A container that integrates Concepts and ConceptMentions.

featureDescription.name: concepts
featureDescription.description: A list of all concepts mentioned in the corresponding text.

featureDescription.name: mentions
featureDescription.description: A list of all mentions in the text.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.doc.DocMeta
typeDescription.description: It stores the document meta data. Such as the name of document.
